title: Sexism in advertising in the U.S. 2016
summary: This bar chart has 4 categories for the x axis representing Share of..., and a y axis representing Unnamed: 1.
The highest category is found at ...respondents_who_have_seen_ads_that_portay_women_as_dumb_helpless_or_incompetent where Unnamed: 1 is 85.0.
The lowest category is found at ...respondents_who_have_seen_advertising_they_deem_"offensive"_to_women where Unnamed: 1 is 76.0.

...respondents who have seen ads that portay women as dumb helpless or incompetent
...female respondents who have been offended by sexism in advertising
...respondents who have seen ads they find ridiculous in how they portray women
...respondents who have seen advertising they deem "offensive" to women

gold: The statistic shows data on sexism in advertising in the United States as of July 2016 . During a survey , 76 percent of respondents stated they had seen advertising they deemed `` offensive '' to women .
